questions.question: What is the best first move when you want to join a campus club?
choices: Check the student activities board and social pages
Wait for someone to invite you
Skip meetings and just join the group chat

questions.question: Which habit keeps campus study sessions productive?
choices: Set a clear agenda and time limit
Study with no breaks for six hours

questions.question: A campus event sells out fast. What is a smart move?
choices: Register early and add it to your calendar

questions.question: When networking on campus, what should you lead with?
choices: A clear intro and what you are learning
A long story about past high school wins

questions.question: What is a quick way to stay organized during the semester?
How can you make the most of office hours?
What's a good strategy for managing group projects?
choices: Assign roles early and set milestones
Wait until the night before to start
Let one person do all the work

questions.question: How should you approach a professor for a recommendation letter?
choices: Ask early with your resume and goals
Demand one the day before it's due

questions.question: What's the best way to prepare for midterm exams?
choices: Start reviewing a week early with practice tests
Skip classes and hope for the best

questions.question: How can you build connections with classmates?
choices: Join study groups and attend campus events

questions.question: What should you do if you're struggling in a course?
choices: Reach out to the professor or TA early
Wait until after failing the final

questions.question: How do you balance academics with extracurriculars?
choices: Do only one and ignore the other

questions.question: What's a smart approach to internship hunting?
choices: Start early and tailor each application
Send the same generic resume everywhere

questions.question: How can you make a good impression on the first day of class?
choices: Arrive on time and introduce yourself

questions.question: What's the benefit of attending campus workshops?
choices: Learn new skills and meet professionals
Only go to get free food

questions.question: What does an algorithm describe?
choices: A step-by-step process to solve a problem

questions.question: Which data structure is best for first-in, first-out behavior?
What does HTML control on a web page?

What does 'O(n)' mean in Big O notation?
Which programming paradigm focuses on functions without side effects?
What is a pointer in C++?
choices: A variable that stores a memory address

questions.question: Which HTTP method is used to retrieve data?
What does SQL stand for?
Which sorting algorithm has O(n log n) average time complexity?
What is the purpose of a compiler?
choices: Translate source code to machine code

questions.question: Which protocol is used for secure web communication?
What is a REST API?
choices: An architectural style for web services

questions.question: What is the difference between '==' and '===' in JavaScript?
choices: '===' checks type and value, '==' only checks value

questions.question: What is a virtual machine?
choices: Software that emulates a physical computer

questions.question: Which design pattern ensures a class has only one instance?
What does API stand for?
What is the purpose of a database index?
Which language is primarily used for Android app development?
What is recursion in programming?
